question: In Kanazawa City, Japan, what is the name of the museum dedicated to contemporary art, which opened in 2004?
true_answer: 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art, Kanazawa
asked_question_translated: Kuidas nimetatakse Jaapanis Kanazawa linnas 2004. aastal avatud kaasaegsele kunstile p√ºhendatud muuseumi?
answer: Kanazawas asuvat kaasaegse kunsti muuseumi nimetatakse 21. sajandi kaasaegse kunsti muuseumiks (21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art).
answer_translated_eng: The Kanazawa Museum of Contemporary Art is called the 21st Century Museum of Contemporary Art.
